entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then north 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 15.
